cleaned_text: Intelligent medical Acupuncture robotic system International Conference on Alternative Medicine and Traditional Medicine June 10-11, 2019 | Edinburgh, Scotland Tiancheng Xu Nanjing University of Chinese Medicine, China Posters & Accepted Abstracts : [Allied J Med Res](https://www.alliedacademies.org/allied-journal-of-medical-research/) Abstract: Acupuncture is the world recognized Chinese medicine therapy and has been applied to more than 183 countries or regions. High cost-effective, small side effects, low requirement to the clinic requirement and applicable to the family, community clinics, hospitals and other kinds of scenes, as policy implementation of the Belt and Road, Chinese acupuncture will become the backbone of the world medical care as well as acupuncture robots based on the traditional theory will inject new vitality for future medical treatment.
